response.overview: Listed by Erik Barnouw (from Jay Leydaâ€™s research) as one of the foreign fiction films shown in Soviet theaters in the 1920s; separately noted by John Willett as an imported attraction in Moscow during the NEP years. The original production title, country, personnel, and exact year are not identified in these sources.
